translations.accept_policy:
*ACCEPTING THE REGULATIONS OF ECONET SYSTEM
I have read the ecoNET regulations and the https://www.econet24.com/ regulations and the Privacy Policy. I hereby state that I have understood those documents and agree to comply with them.

translations.termsClause: We inform/Service Provider informs, that the Regulations of ecoNET service have been changed. Further use of the ecoNET service requires acceptance of the new content of the Regulations. User has right to terminate agreement with immediate effect within 14 days of receiving this notification regarding amendments in Regulations.
translations.alertText: We will be preforming maintenanace between ==/fromDateTime/== and ==/toDateTime/==. We apologize for any inconveniences.
translations.service_info_news: We would like to kindly inform that due to planned maintenance between 7:00 to 15:00 UTC on 09.11.2017 the ecoNET24 service will be unavailable. We are sorry for inconvenience.

translations.boiler_control_off: Do you want to turn off the boiler?
translations.boiler_control_on: Do you want to turn on the boiler?

translations.regulator_control_on: Do you want to turn on the controller?
translations.remote_menu_param_edit_lock: The ability to edit this parameter has been locked.
translations.AIRFLOW_POWER_100: Airflow power at 100% of boiler power (primary airflow power in retort controllers)
translations.AIRFLOW_POWER_50: Airflow power at 50% of boiler power
translations.AIRFLOW_POWER_30: Airflow power at 30% of boiler power
translations.POWER_100: Boiler power (kW) at operating level of 100%
translations.POWER_50: Boiler power (kW) at operating level of 50%
translations.POWER_30: Boiler power (kW) at operating level of 30%
translations.MAX_FAN_BOILER_POWER: Fan power at maximum boiler power
translations.MIN_FAN_BOILER_POWER: Fan power at minimum boiler power
translations.FUEL_FEEDING_TIME_100: Fuel feeding time at 100% of boiler power (primary feeding time in retort controllers)
translations.FUEL_FEEDING_TIME_50: Fuel feeding time at 50% of boiler power
translations.FUEL_FEEDING_TIME_30: Fuel feeding time at 30% of boiler power
translations.FUEL_FEEDING_BREAK_100: Fuel feeding interval duration at 100% of boiler power (primary feeding interval in retort controllers)
translations.FUEL_FEEDING_BREAK_50: Fuel feeding interval duration at 50% of boiler power
translations.FUEL_FEEDING_BREAK_30: Fuel feeding interval duration at 30% of boiler power
translations.BOILER_HYSTERESIS: Boiler hysteresis (primary hysteresis in retort controllers)
translations.CONTROL_MODE: Boiler operation mode (For standard mode there is no possibility of editing the operating mode. Standard mode is set permanently)
translations.MIN_FL_POWER: Minimum boiler power in FL mode
translations.MAX_FL_POWER: Maximum boiler power in FL mode
translations.FAN_POWER_GAIN: Fan power reinforcement in FL algorithm (100% = reinforcement 0%; 110% = reinforcement 10%)
translations.FUEL_FLOW_CORRECTION_FL: Fuel stream adjustment in FL algorithm (100% = adjustment 0%)
translations.FUEL_FLOW_CORRECTION: Fuel quantity adjustment (100% = adjustment 0%) Applicable also to standard mode.
translations.AIRFLOW_CORRECTION_100: Airflow power adjustment at boiler power of 100% (100% = adjustment 0%)
translations.FEEDER_CORRECTION_100: Feeder operation time adjustment at boiler power of 100% (100% = adjustment 0 s.)
translations.AIRFLOW_CORRECTION_50: Airflow power adjustment at boiler power of 50% (100% = adjustment 0%)
translations.FEEDER_CORRECTION_50: Feeder operation time adjustment at boiler power of 50% (100% = adjustment 0 s.)
translations.AIRFLOW_CORRECTION_30: Airflow power adjustment at boiler power of 30% (100% = adjustment 0%)
translations.FEEDER_CORRECTION_30: Feeder operation time adjustment at boiler power of 30% (100% = adjustment 0 s.)
translations.CO_TEMP_GRATE: CH boiler preset temperature in grate mode
translations.DET_TIME_FUEL_GRATE: Fuel shortage detection time in grate mode
translations.AIRFLOW_POWER_KINDLE: Airflow power in firing up mode
translations.SMALL_AIRFLOW_POWER_KINDLE: Blow-off power during firing up (fan modulation)
translations.AIRFLOW_KINDLE_DELAY: Fan modulation delay (fan works with airflow power)
translations.FEEDER_KINDLE: Fuel feeding time in firing up mode
translations.FEEDER_KINDLE_WEIGHT: Fuel quantity poured during firing up (*5)
translations.KINDLE_TIME: Heater operation time in firing up
translations.WARMING_UP_TIME: Heater warming up time before firing up
translations.FUMES_TEMP_KINDLE_FINISH: Flame detection exhaust temperature in firing up
translations.FINISH_KINDLE_THRESHOLD: Flame detection threshold at an optical sensor
translations.FUMES_DELTA_KINDLE: Exhaust temperature delta at the end of firing up
translations.DELTA_T_KINDLE: Exhaust temperature delta at the end of firing up
translations.MIN_KINDLE_POWER_TIME: Minimum power operation time after firing up
translations.FEED_TIME_SUPERVISION: Feeder operation time in SUPERVISION mode
translations.FEED_TIME_SUPERVISION_WEIGHT: Fuel quantity poured in SUPERVISION mode (*5)
translations.FEED_SUPERVISION_BREAK: Feeder interval duration in SUPERVISION mode
translations.FAN_SUPERVISON_BREAK: Fan interval duration in SUPERVISION mode
translations.FAN_WORK_SUPERVISION: Fan operation time in SUPERVISION mode
translations.INCREASE_FAN_SUPPORT_MODE: Fan operation extension in support mode (supervision)
translations.AIRFLOW_WORK_EXTINGUISH: Airfow operation time in putting out
translations.AIRFLOW_BRAKE_EXTINGUISH: Airflow interval duration in putting out
translations.SCAVENGE_START_EXTINGUISH: Flame detection threshold that initiates putting out blow-off
translations.SCAVENGE_STOP_EXTINGUISH: Flame detection threshold that finishes putting out blow-off
translations.CLEAN_BEGIN_TIME: Cleaning time in firing up mode
translations.EXTINGUISH_CLEAN_TIME: Cleaning time in putting out mode
translations.WARMING_UP_BRAKE_TIME: Operation time after which boiler putting out starts automatically
translations.REMIND_TIME: Fuel quantity initializing the CH boiler cleaning remainder (*5)
translations.LAMBDA_CORRECTION_RANGE: Airflow adjustment range in FL LAMBDA algorithm
translations.OXYGEN_100: Oxygen level at operating level of 100%
translations.OXYGEN_50: Oxygen level at operating level of 50%
translations.OXYGEN_30: Oxygen level at operating level of 30%
translations.OXYGEN_CORRECTION_FL: Preset oxygen level adjustment in FL algorithm (100% = adjustment 0%)
translations.FEEDER_CALIBRATION: Fuel quantity poured during feeder calibration (*5)
translations.PAUSE_CO_CWU: CH pump standstill time from HUW status
translations.PAUSE_TERM: CH pump standstill time during thermostat operation
translations.WORK_TERM: CH pump operation time despite shorted thermostat contact
translations.INCREASE_TEMP_CO: Increase preset CH temperature from HUW, mixers or buffer status
translations.DECREASE_SET_CO_TERM: Decrease in boiler preset temperature with shorted thermostat contact
translations.TERM_PUMP_OFF: Turning off CO pump from the thermostat
translations.EXTERN_BOILER_TEMP: Outer boiler turn-off temperature (0 - outer boiler control off)
translations.MIN_MIX_SET_TEMP: Minimum heating circuit set point temperature
translations.MAX_MIX_SET_TEMP: Maximum heating circuit set point temperature
translations.LOW_MIX_SET_TEMP: Lowering temperature set point of he circuit with shorted thermostat contact
translations.PARALLEL_OFFSET_HEAT_CURV: Parallel displacement of heating curve circulation
translations.MIX_SUMMER_WORK: The mixer pump operation in summer mode
translations.SOLAR_DELTA_T_ON: Delta T of solar pump turn on
translations.SOLAR_DELTA_T_OFF: Delta T of solar pump turn off
translations.MIN_TEMP_MHS: Minimum temperature of the primary heat source
translations.MAX_TEMP_MHS: Maximum temperature of the primary heat source
translations.HIST_MHS: Hysteresis of the main heat source
translations.INCREASING_ST_MHS: Increasing temperature set point of the main heat source
translations.T_OFF_MHS: Temperature of turning off the main heat source
translations.T_STARTU_PUMP_AHS: Temperature of turning on additional heat pump
translations.T_COOLING_ASH: The cooling temperature an additional heat source
translations.T_LOCK_PUMP_ANNEALING: Time lock the pump in case of burn-circuit
translations.DECREASE_THERM_TEMP_H: Lowering temperature of water from the thermostat
translations.LOCK_THERM_H: Lock the pump from the room thermostat
translations.TI_PID_H: Integration time constant of the actuator
translations.PARALLEL_HEAT_CURVE_H: Parallel displacement of heating curve circulation
translations.U3: Energy recovered from collector two days ago
translations.U4: Energy recovered from collector three days ago
translations.U5: Energy recovered from collector four days ago
translations.U6: Energy recovered from collector five days ago
translations.U7: Energy recovered from collector six days ago
translations.U8: Energy recovered from collector seven days ago
translations.U9: Energy recovered from collector eight days ago
translations.U10: Energy recovered from collector nine days ago
translations.U11: Energy recovered from collector ten days ago
translations.U12: Energy recovered from collector eleven days ago
translations.U13: Energy recovered from collector twelve days ago
translations.U14: Energy recovered from collector thirteen days ago
translations.T1pop: T1 temperature value stored in function of vacuum tube collector
translations.T3pop: T3 temperature value stored in function of vacuum tube collector
translations.dTAB: Temperature difference for activation of heat propagation
translations.dTCO: Temperature difference for activation of tank loading by boiler
translations.Tryb_eco: Eco mode for deactivating tank reheating by heater when the sun is out
translations.Tsch__W_: Tank temperature for activation of night-time cooling mode
translations.Tsch__WY_: Target tank temperature in night-time cooling mode
translations.Alarm_TCOLkr: Enabling / disabling alarm when collector exceeds critical temperature
translations.TCWUmin: HUW tank minimum target temperature when loaded by heater or backup source
translations.dTwlCWU: Temperature difference between collector and tank for activation of collector pump
translations.dTwyCWU: Temperature difference between collector and tank for deactivation of collector pump
translations.dTwlBAS: Temperature difference between collector and pool for activation of collector pump
translations.dTwyBAS: Temperature difference between collector and pool for deactivation of collector pump
translations.TCOLmin: Minimum collector temperature required to load tank
translations.TCOLkr: Collector critical temperature which will activate the collector pump despite reaching HUW temperature setting
translations.TCOLmax: Maximum collector temperature which will stop system operation
translations.TCWUmax: Maximum HUW tank temperature which will block tank loading
translations.Pmin: Collector pump revolutions upon reaching dTCWUwyÅ‚ or dTBASwyÅ‚
translations.tP: Minimum working time of collector pump when 100% filled
translations.tZAW: Operation time of circuit switching valve
translations.TCOmin: Minimum CH circuit temperature required for the system to load the tank
translations.dTP2: Exchanger return temperature difference for activation of exchanger pump
translations.Przep_yw_P1: P1 pump flow calibration needed to calculate heat output
translations.Przep_yw_P2: P2 pump flow calibration needed to calculate heat output
translations.Poz_detekcji: Collector temperature difference of vacuum tube collector function for activation of impulse
translations.Czas_pracy: Required time of temperature increase for vacuum tube collector function
translations.Kier_enkod: Change of encoder direction in rotating menu
translations.Timeout: Inactivity time before deactivating backlight and exiting to main screen
translations.Ambient_light: Activation of knob backlight function (useful when trying to find the controller in a dark room)
translations.Anoda_tytanowa: Tank protection function (with titanium anode) activates
translations.T_trw_alarmu_A: Duration time for titanium anode malfunction Alarm
translations.T_prz_alarmu_A: Pause duration time for titanium anode malfunction Alarm
translations.Napi_cie_zadane: Voltage value for detection of titanium anode malfunction
translations.Hist_napi_cia: Voltage hysteresis for titanium anode Alarm
translations.EcosolAlarm9: Solar panel A critical temp. exceed
translations.EcosolAlarm10: Solar panel B critical temp. exceed
